entry.title: Yellow Glitter Epoxy Star Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Epoxy
Price: 9.00 - 24.00 (7 variants)

Yellow Glitter Epoxy Star Charm. This charm completes any collection.

  • Sterling Silver Plated 100 Mils
  • Made in the U.S.A.
  • Three Dimensional
  • Designed by Nancy Dreishpoon
  • Copyrighted
